justification: “The first is the commonly used Autism Spectrum Quotient (AQ)… we applied two self-assessment questionnaires that measure autism traits.”
“Second, we also use the Comprehensive Autistic Trait Inventory (CATI)… a novel questionnaire … to measure autism traits.”
“Depressive traits are assessed via the Zung Self-Rating Depression Scale (SDS).”

measured_by: Adult ADHD Self-Report Scale Symptom Checklist (A-SRS)
justification: “ADHD traits via the Adult ADHD-Self Report Scale Symptom Checklist (A-SRS).”
“Alexithymia traits via the Perth Alexithymia Questionnaire (PAQ).”
“We also evaluated the relation with broader cognitive abilities, as measured with the International Cognitive Ability Resource (ICAR).”
“In our truffle task … We measured exploration behavior using various behavioral metrics.”

measured_by: Gaussian Process – Upper Confidence Bound model parameter β
justification: “The uncertainty-guided exploration parameter β measures the importance of reducing this uncertainty.”

measured_by: Gaussian Process – Upper Confidence Bound model length-scale parameter
justification: “First, the GP-UCB model estimates the strength of generalization parameter (for length scale)… reflecting how strongly rewards are correlated.”
